tr.th:
The fields that contain (*) are mandatory to be filled.
The custom field is changed according to the task observed.
The custom field is done by the observer.

tr.th:
Evaluation of Task Observation
تقييم ملاحظة المهمة

tr.th:
UN = Unacceptable
غير مقبول
(Stop Work & Take immediate action)
(توقف عن العمل واتخاذ إجراء فورًا)

th.style: vertical-align : middle;text-align : left;border-bottom: 1px solid black;border-top: 1px solid black;border-right: 1px solid black;

tr.th:
NI = Need Improvement
(But safe to continue)
يلزم تحسين
(لكن من الآمن أن يستمر في عمله)
